MItem1.Name: [Body] Small Mist Stone
MItem1.Description:
A material used to evolve heavy armor, light armor, and robes.
Can be obtained through [Body] Mist Stone Quest.
After collecting enough, you can trade them in for a [Body] Mist Stone.

MItem2.Name: [All] Small Mist Stone
MItem2.Description:
A material used to evolve weapons and amor.
Can be obtained through [All] Mist Stone Quest.
After collecting enough, you can trade them in for an [All] Mist Stone.
